Vitis Vision Library¶

The AMD Vitis™ Vision library is a set of FPGA and AI Engine device optimized functions, intended for application developers using AMD Zynq™ 7000 SoC, AMD Zynq UltraScale+™ MPSoC, AMD Versal Adaptive SoC VCK190, and PCIE-based AMD Alveo™ U200 and U50 devices. The Vitis vision library provides a software interface for computer vision functions accelerated on FPGA and AI Engine devices.

Note

Vitis Vision library functions are mostly similar in functionality to their OpenCV equivalent. Any deviations, if present, are documented.
